name: Lily Carnation
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may trash one of your characters with 6000 power or more. Play up to 1 [FILM] type character card with a power between 2000 to 5000 from your trash, rested.

effect.text: You may trash one of your characters with 6000 power or more. Play up to 1 [FILM] type character card with a power between 2000 to 5000 from your trash, rested.
